players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "I am the detective and I found out Bob is the mafioso."
You: "I'm still trying to figure things out. I haven't made any conclusions yet."
Bob: "Let's all try to figure out who the mafioso is together."
Charlie: "I'm the detective and I've identified Bob as the mafioso. We need to work together to ensure justice is served."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
